title: In cases, where permission for development under accommodation reservation principle is already gran
clause_text: In cases, where permission for development under accommodation reservation principle is already granted as per earlier regulations, the same shall continue to be valid as per the provisions of Regulation 9(5) vi)
section: General conditions to allow development under above regulations:-
